original_text: And his concubine played the whore against him, and went away from him unto her father's house to Bethlehemjudah, and was there four whole months.
korean_text: 그 첩이 행음하고 남편을 떠나 유다 베들레헴 그의 아버지의 집에 돌아가서 거기서 넉 달 동안을 지내매

sentences.original_text: And his concubine played the whore against him
unto her father's house to Bethlehemjudah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 베들레헴에 있는 그녀 아버지 집으로 갔으며

sentences.original_text: and was there four whole months
